uk.ac.cam.cl.juliet.slave.listening

Class Listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.juliet.slave.listening.Listener

  • public class Listener
extends java.lang.Object
    The listener reads packets send from the master PC and passes them on to either the XDP processor or query handler.
    Author:
    Dylan McDermott

    • Method Detail

      • listen

        public void listen(java.lang.String server,
          int thePort,
          DatabaseConnection db,
          XDPProcessor xdpProcessor,
          QueryProcessor queryProcessor)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.sql.SQLException
        Connects to the server and begins to read and process packets.
        Parameters:
        server - The IP address of the server to connect to.
        thePort - The port to connect to on the server.
        db - A connection to the database.
        xdpProcessor - The object which is used to process XDP packets.
        queryProcessor - The object which is used to process queries.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException
